ValidationRule.description: When Retraining is on, and Retraining Type is not Rolling, Retraining Date and Retraining Interval are required, and the interval must be a positive integer.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( PDLM__Retraining__c = true, TEXT(PDLM__Retraining_Type__c) != 'Rolling', OR ( ISNULL( PDLM__Retraining_Date__c ), OR ( ISNULL( PDLM__Retraining_Interval__c ), PDLM__Retraining_Interval__c < 1 ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Retraining is on, and Retraining Type is not Rolling, Retraining Date and Retraining Interval are required, and the interval must be a positive integer.
